title: That'a great Akali buff.
body: You know what would be better? If her E proced her Q.

replies.body: I still don't get why they nerfed her E in that way, making a champ more clunky is one of the worst ways to nerf them I would of been happier with a damage/spellvamp decrease because those were the two issues in the first place not her E procing Q.
I never found her clunky when she was released and you had to melee to trigger the mark... Seemed p. normal especially considering the damage and spell vamp she spits out.

> [{quoted}](name=Fruitlewp,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0ienBUNd,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-05-14T12:26:30.523+0000)
>
> I never found her clunky when she was released and you had to melee to trigger the mark... Seemed p. normal especially considering the damage and spell vamp she spits out.

Back then there wasn't Zed and Freelosandra in every game, and it wasnt League of Mobility.
It just means that Lich Bane is a solid buy now because you can make full use of it's passive.
